LanguageData.CookMealSimple.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealFine.label: cook fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.label: cook lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
